about.description: I'm Pedro Moura, a Frontend Developer in Rio de Janeiro, crafting digital experiences that are user-friendly and highly efficient.
about.text: I'm passionate about creating intuitive and visually appealing interfaces. My skills encompass technologies like React, Redux, React Native, NEXTJS, VITE, and JavaScript/TypeScript, enabling me to build high-performance web and mobile applications. With a strong background in JavaScript and TypeScript, I ensure efficiency and robustness in my code. My approach includes utilizing various tools such as HTML, CSS, and frameworks like Material UI and Tailwind CSS. I stay continuously updated with emerging technologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

experience.manabi-text: As a Front-end Developer and Tech Lead at one of Manabi Group's partner companies, Baymetrics, I lead a team of highly skilled professionals. Together with the Manabi team, our focus is on driving innovation and technical excellence, contributing to the ongoing success of the projects we develop.
experience.serinews-text: Working in partnership with SERINEWS provides me with a unique experience where I can apply my technical knowledge and front-end development skills to meet the specific needs of each client. I have the autonomy to make decisions and manage projects, ensuring that results are delivered with excellence.
experience.4tuna-text: Working at AgÃªncia 4Tuna has been a rewarding experience, where I can apply my passion for the mobile world and creativity to each project. The autonomy I have to work collaboratively with the team and clients allows us to deliver personalized and innovative solutions, driving the success of our clients.
